thread.title: Re: Full Fibre upgrade half the speed it should be
thread.title_full: Re: Full Fibre upgrade half the speed it should be

author: ferguson
title: Re: Full Fibre upgrade half the speed it should be
text:
Weâ€™re here 24/7. 365 days a year.
Ask questions. Find your answers. Connect.
Tuesday
got my full fibre connection last wednesday Talktalk forgot to send me a eroo router and cut off my internet 1 hourt after the engeneer left, now i just got my eroo router on monday and connected following all the instructions correctly i am getting 90mbs constistantly andf should be getting 152mbs, i spent 2 hours talking to a non english based customer service peron on the website chat service where i felt i was being treated like a 5 year old also questioning me that my official router wasnt official and was 3rd party and wanting to know how i got hold it????? they also clearly was using pre made messeges that make u feel they do not really know what there doing, i stil have slow fibre i need to speak to someone that is based in England and understands Englands Phone network and not just what there been shown in a photograph
4 hours ago
Cool, thanks for that.
5 hours ago
Was a bad ethernet cable i had purchased and a replacment fixed the issue.
5 hours ago
That's good to know, can you tell us a wee bit more maybe for the benefit of others?
5 hours ago
Problem has been resolved
13 hours ago
Hi Paul,
Can you add either your TalkTalk home telephone number or account number to your community profile and we'll take a look at this for you
Chris
Chris, Community Team
[Our latest Blog](/blog) l [Share your Ideas](/ideas) l [Service Status](/servicestatus) l [Help with your Service](/t5/Help-with-your-TalkTalk-service/ct-p/help) l [Community Stars](/t5/custom/page/page-id/SuperUserHub) l Set your preferences
yesterday
HI yes the speed of 150mbps was using the eero app speed test testing on my pc next to the eero connected via the Stupidly short ethernet cable supplied with the eero is 90mbps wireless is consistatly around 40/50MBps
yesterday
Hi paul,
I'm sorry to hear this. Can I just confirm, is it now just the wired PC which is experiencing the slow speeds?
Thanks
Michelle
yesterday
Runing tests last night i could get 150mbps speed to my eero router using the supplied ethernet cable to the wall box BUT not get it to my wired PC not get anywhere near that speed over wifi i for the test i used a cat 5E ethernet cable which should be fine as there capable of 1000Mbps im so confused
Tuesday
yes ive seen it and updateed my profile with my details Thank you
Tuesday
Not sure what you did there, can you see my previous response?
Tuesday
wired and the app shows same speed using the app speed test 90 to 93 mbps
Tuesday
OK, thanks for that. If you would like the support team to look into this for you make sure that your personal details including TalkTalk phone number and/or account number are complete on your community profile (click here) so that they can link your forum identity with your account and then wait for them to respond.
Tuesday - last edited Tuesday
Tuesday
Are these speeds from wireless tests? What connection speed is the eero app showing?
